author: Trevor Smith
title: Migos Take "Bad & Boujee" To Ellen
text:
Home > Music > Migos Take "Bad & Boujee" To Ellen Migos Take "Bad & Boujee" To Ellen 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith  47pm Apparently, you can say "thot" on Ellen. 
Migos ' "Bad and Boujee" is the "hottest song in the world," according to Ellen Degeneres, who had the trio perform the #1 hit on her show this week. Offset, Quavo and Takeoff brought the same energy they would to any performance to the daytime television set, and the crowd was very on board to dance along. Though they self-censored the performance, Offset curiously left his "thot, thot, thot" line in the hook. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 20, 2017 at 12:47pm 1 View 
Danielle Bregoli wants beef with two of the most famous reality stars in the business. Apparently, you can say "thot" on Ellen. 
Migos ' "Bad and Boujee" is the "hottest song in the world," according to Ellen Degeneres, who had the trio perform the #1 hit on her show this week. Offset, Quavo and Takeoff brought the same energy they would to any performance to the daytime television set, and the crowd was very on board to dance along. Though they self-censored the performance, Offset curiously left his "thot, thot, thot" line in the hook.
